page.title: 13UPLAWMOOR YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Uplawmoor Youth Club is open to boys and girls of 12 years or at secondary school.There are 60 members and every Thursday evening some 50 of them come to the club. We have a pool table, dartboard, board games, ball games, netball stands and many other items of equipment. The Club bought their own disco unit in 1983 and we run many discos which everyone really enjoys. The disco unit also acts as a means of fund-raising and has been hired out for parties and discos in the village. The Club has many competitions and demonstration evenings. Every year we have a bus trip and have even been to Blackpool twice. Enthusiastic teenagers find it a happy place to meet and chat.
